channel.title: Trying To Get A Shard Server Running
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, I'm a noobie trying to get a server running, I like the way this whole editing and adding objects sounds with Shard, but I need a base, is their a way to get it as a base so I can start editing, run the server,and such? Anyone have a link I could use? Last question, can I add NPC's and all that stuff while I have the server running and people are playing? Appreciate your help, if you need you can IM me via MSN "slayer51493@live.com"
Thanks Much, :cool: C. Negatory :cool:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 09:32:34 pm[/size][hr]Whenever I run the server and I go to the address in my webbrowser that I registered with No-Ip in Safari I'll get a blank white page and in IE it will tell me "Oops, broken link!" or Cannot find the webpage, this thing is making me lose my sanity!

item.title: Trying To Get A Shard Server Running
item.dc:creator: @CaptainNegatory CaptainNegatory
item.description:
@CaptainNegatory wrote:

Hello Everyone,
I’m a noobie trying to get a server running, I like the way this whole editing and adding objects sounds with Shard, but I need a base, is their a way to get it as a base so I can start editing, run the server,and such? Anyone have a link I could use? Last question, can I add NPC’s and all that stuff while I have the server running and people are playing? Appreciate your help, if you need you can IM me via MSN "slayer51493@live.com"

       Thanks Much,
